name: INFO
description: Alarm is rased for information reasons only and safely can be ignored. No services affected

name: WARNING
description: Some services can be affected. Overall impact on network operation is small

name: MINOR
description: Some services are affected. Overal impact on network operation is limited

name: MAJOR
description: Significant services are affected. Overal impact on network operation is serious

name: CRITICAL
description: Serious impact on services detected. Network is down or operating in degraded mode
